# Changelog

## [0.2.0](https://github.com/SongshGeo/matplotkit/compare/v0.1.2...v0.2.0) (2025-12-12)


### Features

* **annotations:** :sparkles: Add get_sig_marker function for statistical significance markers with extensive input validation and customizable thresholds ([54ad918](https://github.com/SongshGeo/matplotkit/commit/54ad91839b7f1c9ad797be9fa7a04a67c7e9b7a2))
* **api:** :sparkles: generate color list from Matplotlib cmap ([7d19768](https://github.com/SongshGeo/matplotkit/commit/7d19768147f1158baccd21679e44e18a6139182d))


### Bug Fixes

* **annotations:** :bug: Ensure compatibility of p_val with numpy types by converting to native float for consistent comparison ([62ce553](https://github.com/SongshGeo/matplotkit/commit/62ce55364971cd8add028780a1669a7381a8059d))
* **decorators:** :bug: Update with_axes decorator to accept Optional Callable for enhanced version flexibility ([28c6caf](https://github.com/SongshGeo/matplotkit/commit/28c6caf732bc5e03efd8c497f25b0c0600569f98))


### Documentation

### Refactoring

* **project:** :tada: Refactored useful functions from other projects and start this new package! ([a2be79d](https://github.com/SongshGeo/matplotkit/commit/a2be79d31d3cf6abf498915006d31bad91c983e4))


### Chores
